channel.title: PI hover skill exp doesnt work (not correct exp)
channel.description: My Hover exp doesnt work.. it always shows 0 and exp till level 83, even at 99..

item.title: PI hover skill exp doesnt work (not correct exp)
item.dc:creator: @loruviam loruviam
item.description:
@loruviam wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:538896”][quote author=loruviam link=topic=657733.msg4399811#msg4399811 date=1390333440]

Give more information please so we can actually help you. What base are you using?

Project insanity, I’ve added 602 skill tab, everything works fine except for the exp… The text is there but when i train, You don’t see that you’re getting the exp… it stays 0 but the levels goes up.
[/quote]
When you added the new skill tab, you didn’t update the string ID’s of the exp. So the server is trying to send the new xp strings to the wrong id.
I don’t know what your new ones are, so don’t ask me.[/quote]

Ohh i see, thank you very much so i need to edit Playerassist?

Read full topic
item.source: PI hover skill exp doesnt work (not correct exp)

item.title: PI hover skill exp doesnt work (not correct exp)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“loruviam, post:3, topic:538896”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=657733.msg4399807#msg4399807 date=1390332867]
Give more information please so we can actually help you. What base are you using?
[/quote]

Project insanity, I’ve added 602 skill tab, everything works fine except for the exp… The text is there but when i train, You don’t see that you’re getting the exp… it stays 0 but the levels goes up.[/quote]
When you added the new skill tab, you didn’t update the string ID’s of the exp. So the server is trying to send the new xp strings to the wrong id.
I don’t know what your new ones are, so don’t ask me.

Read full topic
